task.title: Self Check out a book from the library
task.shortdesc: Reading books help improve your knowledge.

context.p: Library is a great resource. They carry many books that you can borrow without having to purchase. When you become a member you get a card that you can use to checkout books.

step.cmd: Find your book using the catalogue.
Take the book to the self checkout station.
Swipe your card in the card reader so that your id can be found in the system.
Oce your profile is up on the system, place your books one by one on the barcode reader
Wait for the reader to read the barcode and repeat for every book you plan on borrowing,
Collect your receipt and make sure to return the book by the due date to avoid any fine.
